route::home.title: Jeff-frontend boilerplate
description: This is a boilerplate for a frontend application using Vue 3, Typescript, Vue Router, Pinia, Vite, Lodash, PouchDB, Sass & normalize.css.
It is made as a scaffolding framework to quickly get up and running to develop a webapplication build upon the headless Strapi CMS.

strapi-test.title: Test Strapi REST connection
strapi-test.subtitle: Configure the .env file of your project to match it with the right Strapi server configuration.

details.title: Route inspiration
details.subtitle: Some routes you can use to test the connection.
paths: /users/me - Returns details of the authorized user
details.footnote: Look in the Strapi admin panel for more details upon the available endpoints

strapi-auth-test.title: Test Strapi authentication
strapi-auth-test.confirmMessage: If there is an existing account for %{ confirmMessage }, there will be an e-mail on its way with a password reset link.
